verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:6
verses.text: And the sons of Zerah; Zimri, and Ethan, and Heman, and Calcol, and Dara: five of them in all.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:7
verses.text: And the sons of Carmi; Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:8
verses.text: And the sons of Ethan; Azariah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:9
verses.text: The sons also of Hezron, that were born unto him; Jerahmeel, and Ram, and Chelubai.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:10
verses.text: And Ram begat Amminadab; and Amminadab begat Nahshon, prince of the children of Judah;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:11
verses.text: And Nahshon begat Salma, and Salma begat Boaz,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:12
verses.text: And Boaz begat Obed, and Obed begat Jesse,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:13
verses.text: And Jesse begat his firstborn Eliab, and Abinadab the second, and Shimma the third,
